comment.author: 37169126@N05
comment._content: The man in the lower left corner of the photo. Is it me, or does he look like he's using a cell phone. I actually didn't even think about it at first since I'm so used to seeing people on the phone in the street, but could this be evidence of time travel and how does he get a signal back in 1913 :-)

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Maybe he is cupping his left ear to hear what his wife (off camera to the right) is shouting at him over the noise of the demolition work -- something about a store window full of bargains on imported celluloid widgets.
